languages.text: The psyber-raven suffers 9 warp damage and every creature in a 4-cell radius around it suffers <u>(9 × number of affected creatures)</u> warp damage. After that, the affected creatures (except the psyber-raven) whose number of wounds is divisible by 9, lose 9% of their maximum wounds.

traits.locale_text: Deals 9 Warp damage to the Psyber-Raven. After that, each creature in the Psyber-Raven's area receives (9 * number of creatures) Warp damage. If their remaining Wounds divide by 9, they lose 9% of their maximum Wounds.

languages.text: The psyber-raven suffers 9 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, and every creature in a 4-cell radius around it suffers <u>(9 × number of affected creatures)</u> warp damage. After that, the affected creatures (excluding the psyber-raven), whose number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} is divisible by 9, lose 9% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Псайберворон получает 9 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g}. Каждое существо в радиусе 4 клеток от него получает <u>(9 × число затронутых существ)</u> варп-урона. Затем те из затронутых существ (кроме псайберворона), чье оставшееся {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} делится на 9, теряют по 9% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Псайберворон получает 9 варп-урона. Каждое существо в радиусе 4 клеток от него получает <u>(9 × число затронутых существ)</u> варп-урона. Затем те из затронутых существ (кроме псайберворона), чье оставшееся здоровье делится на 9, теряют по 9% от максимального здоровья.

Псайберворон получает 9 варп-урона. Каждое существо в радиусе 4 клеток от него получает <u>(9 × число затронутых существ)</u> варп-урона. Затем те из затронутых существ (кроме псайберворона), чье оставшееся здоровье делится на 9, теряют по 9% от максимального здоровья.

languages.text: Der Psitech-Rabe erleidet 9 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g}. Alle Kreaturen in einem Radius von 4 Feldern erleiden <u>(9 × Zahl der betroffenen Kreaturen)</u> Warp-Schaden. Danach verlieren die betroffenen Kreaturen (mit Ausnahme des Psitech-Raben), deren Anzahl von {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} durch 9 teilbar ist, 9 % ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text: The psyber-raven suffers 9 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, and every creature in a 4-cell radius around it suffers <u>(9 × number of affected creatures)</u> warp damage. After that, the affected creatures (excluding the psyber-raven), whose number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} is divisible by 9, lose 9% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Psitech-Rabe erleidet 9 Warp-Schaden. Alle Kreaturen in einem Radius von 4 Feldern erleiden <u>(9 × Zahl der betroffenen Kreaturen)</u> Warp-Schaden. Danach verlieren die betroffenen Kreaturen (mit Ausnahme des Psitech-Raben), deren Anzahl von Wunden durch 9 teilbar ist, 9 % ihrer maximalen Wunden.

languages.text: La psyber-corneille subit 9 points de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g} et toutes les créatures dans un rayon de 4 cases autour d'elles subissent <u>(9 × nombre de créatures touchées)</u> points de dégâts du Warp. Ensuite, les créatures touchées (sauf la psyber-corneille) dont le nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est un multiple de 9 perdent 9 % de leurs {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximums{/g}.
languages.original_text: The psyber-raven suffers 9 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, and every creature in a 4-cell radius around it suffers <u>(9 × number of affected creatures)</u> warp damage. After that, the affected creatures (excluding the psyber-raven), whose number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} is divisible by 9, lose 9% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La psyber-corneille subit 9 points de dégâts du Warp et toutes les créatures dans un rayon de 4 cases autour d'elles subissent <u>(9 × nombre de créatures touchées)</u> points de dégâts du Warp. Ensuite, les créatures touchées (sauf la psyber-corneille) dont le nombre de blessures est un multiple de 9 perdent 9 % de leurs blessures maximums.

languages.text: 生化渡鸦受到9点{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}，对距离4格以内的所有生物造成</u>（9×受影响的生物数量）<u>点亚空间伤害。在此之后，所有受影响的生物（除生化渡鸦之外）剩余{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}如果能被9整除，则额外损失{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的9%。
languages.original_text: The psyber-raven suffers 9 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, and every creature in a 4-cell radius around it suffers <u>(9 × number of affected creatures)</u> warp damage. After that, the affected creatures (excluding the psyber-raven), whose number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} is divisible by 9, lose 9% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 生化渡鸦受到9点亚空间伤害，对距离4格以内的所有生物造成</u>（9×受影响的生物数量）<u>点亚空间伤害。在此之后，所有受影响的生物（除生化渡鸦之外）剩余生命值如果能被9整除，则额外损失最大生命值的9%。

languages.text: El psicocuervo sufre 9 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} y todas las criaturas en un radio de 4 casillas sufren <u>(9 × número de criaturas afectadas)</u> de daño de disformidad. Después, las criaturas afectadas (excepto el psicocuervo) cuyo número de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} sea divisible por 9 pierden un 9 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}.
languages.original_text: The psyber-raven suffers 9 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, and every creature in a 4-cell radius around it suffers <u>(9 × number of affected creatures)</u> warp damage. After that, the affected creatures (excluding the psyber-raven), whose number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} is divisible by 9, lose 9% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El psicocuervo sufre 9 de daño de disformidad y todas las criaturas en un radio de 4 casillas sufren <u>(9 × número de criaturas afectadas)</u> de daño de disformidad. Después, las criaturas afectadas (excepto el psicocuervo) cuyo número de heridas sea divisible por 9 pierden un 9 % de sus heridas máximas.

languages.text: サイバーレイヴンは9の{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}を受け、その半径4セル以内のすべての生物は<u>（9×効果を受ける生物の数）</u>のワープダメージを受ける。その後、効果を受けた9で割り切れる数の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を持つ生物（サイバーレイヴンを除く）は、その{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の9%を失う。
languages.original_text: The psyber-raven suffers 9 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g}, and every creature in a 4-cell radius around it suffers <u>(9 × number of affected creatures)</u> warp damage. After that, the affected creatures (excluding the psyber-raven), whose number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} is divisible by 9, lose 9% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: サイバーレイヴンは9のワープダメージを受け、その半径4セル以内のすべての生物は<u>（9×効果を受ける生物の数）</u>のワープダメージを受ける。その後、効果を受けた9で割り切れる数の傷を持つ生物（サイバーレイヴンを除く）は、その最大の傷の9%を失う。
サイバーレイヴンは9のワープダメージを受け、その半径4セル以内のすべての生物は<u>（9×効果を受ける生物の数）</u>のワープダメージを受ける。その後、効果を受けた9で割り切れる数の傷を持つ生物（サイバーレイヴンを除く）は、その最大の傷の9%を失う。

languages.text: Ruhsiber kuzgun 9 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarına{/g} maruz kalır ve etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm yaratıklar da <u>(9 × etkilenen yaratık sayısı)</u> kadar öteboyut hasarı alırlar. Ardından da etkilenen yaratıklar (ruhsiber kuzgun hariç), {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanları 9'a bölünebiliyorsa {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanlarının %9'unu kaybederler.

Ruhsiber kuzgun 9 öteboyut hasarına maruz kalır ve etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm yaratıklar da <u>(9 × etkilenen yaratık sayısı)</u> kadar öteboyut hasarı alırlar.
